comment: avoid at all costs. horrible instructions, rude teacher and in general didn't learn anything.

TERRIBLE. I am majoring in English Education and struggled to make a B-. She gives pretty easy work, but her instructions are impossible to understand and when you ask her questions the answers leave you even more confused than before. Avoid this teacher at all costs, there are so many better English professors!

I personally liked Dr. Broughton. She does play favorites, but its not hard to become one of her favorites. Just do the work and you'll do fine. I took her for both ENGL 1101 and 1102, got B's both times. The people leaving negative comments are probably lazy or excessively use "like" between every other word.

Worst professor I've ever had. Any time I heard people talking about her it had to do with how mean she was or how her assignment instructions were impossible to unriddle. Every Monday and Wednesday I dreaded coming into school because of this class. She's rude and impatient and generally makes you want to stab yourself in the forehead. Avoid.

She is rude. The only reason I made an A is because I went to extremes to do so. She is a nice person underneath but dislikes college students too much to teach. Everyone in my class did bad in her class.

She was horrible. Completely and totally unfair. I was out a day because my 9 year old brother was having seizures and she told me that that was not excuse. She was also extremely rude. She said things that made us feel like we were 2 but she expected our papers to be written like we were 32?? Don't take this professor.
Great teacher, she's an easy A, alot of work, but if willing to work you'll do just fine. Went to class everyday but didn't do much. Papers are all less than 3-4 pages.
Awesome teacher. I have improved my writing twice as much in this class then i did in my four years of high school. Attend class = get an A. Fun teacher too.
do not take this **** as a teacher she sucks and doesnt know what the hell shes talkin about and cant teach worht****
